prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body portrait of a young man standing centered on a pure white background, impressionist oil painting style with rich light and shadow variations and visible brushstrokes. The man has an ordinary yet kind face with soft features: gentle brown eyes that hold a hint of inner light, a straight nose, and a calm, determined expression with a slight, hopeful smile. His skin is warm-toned, kissed by the sun. He has medium-length, tousled sandy-brown hair with subtle golden highlights, as if touched by dawn. He wears simple, light-colored linen traveler's clothing: a loose cream tunic with golden embroidery at the collar and cuffs depicting sun motifs, over beige trousers, and sturdy leather boots. A simple leather satchel is slung across his shoulder. His posture is upright yet humble, emanating an aura of quiet resilience and nascent inner power. The overall atmosphere is serene, beautiful, and infused with a soft, sacred glow, fitting the theme of children of the sun god. no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
